name: Batty Bat (Pings Lair)
description:
2D, Arcade style, Action Game

Touchscreen/Mouse Friendly
Fly your bat around eating mosquitos to score points.
Eat all mosquitos before timer runs out and you will level up.
Avoid the spiders and hornets or you will lose health.
A timer running out or a depleted health bar will end the game.
Do you have what it takes to get the new High Score?
Windows x64 Version
